abstract: The world’s largest retail chain said that Michael T. Duke, 58, had been chosen as the next chief executive and president, succeeding H. Lee Scott Jr.
snippet: The world’s largest retail chain said that Michael T. Duke, 58, had been chosen as the next chief executive and president, succeeding H. Lee Scott Jr.
lead_paragraph: After nearly a decade as chief executive of Wal-Mart Stores, H. Lee Scott Jr. said he would retire at the end of January, walking away at a triumphant time for the nation’s largest retailer.

headline.main: At Wal-Mart, Successor Is Chosen for Its Chief
headline.print_headline: At Wal-Mart, Successor Is Chosen for Its Chief
